message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't let it go for less than $130.  It's still a very good price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
